alert.note: Alert for Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 12 at 8:06PM CDT until May 19 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR CLAY...SOUTHERN HUBBARD...WADENA...SOUTHERN NORMAN...NORTHERN OTTER TAIL...NORTHERN WILKIN...SOUTHERN MAHNOMEN...BECKER...SOUTHERN CLEARWATER...EASTERN CASS AND SOUTHEASTERN TRAILL COUNTIES... At 805 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Horace to near Blue Grass, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Nimrod, Frontier, West Fargo, Prairie Rose, Huntersville, Reile`s Acres, Mapleton, Harwood, Hubbard, Prosper and Brooktree Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 48 and 100. Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 333 and 352. Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 1 and 32. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central, north central, northwestern and west central Minnesota...and southeastern North Dakota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
